items.sentence: Tom bought this umbrella when he was in Boston.
Tom likes the way that Mary makes potato salad.
Most people didn't buy what the president said.
Tom was the one who told me you had to do that.
Have you already finished eating your sandwich?
Tom wasn't the last person to leave the office.
The band takes a ten-minute break between sets.
I still need to buy a birthday present for Tom.
Sit yourself down, Tom. I've made you some tea.
Tom was skating with his friends all afternoon.
How many times an hour do the buses here leave?
Tom isn't sure that he's doing the right thing.
Tom isn't sure that Mary can understand French.
Tom and Mary have two children, John and Alice.
In my opinion, skiing is more fun than skating.
Tom gave Mary something, but I don't know what.
Tom is the one that drove Mary to the hospital.
Tom is sure that Mary knows she has to do that.
The last time I went to Boston, it was snowing.
I don't have to go back to Boston until Monday.
